20110123060751.000|20110123060753.000|CC1|KEMP WAS AN EX-HUSBAND AND THE

20110123060759.000|20110123060800.000|CC1|PROBABLY NEVER SHOULD HAVE      
20110123060800.000|20110123060801.000|CC1|HAPPENED.

20110123062656.000|20110123062700.000|CC1|48 HOURS...

20110123065020.000|20110123065020.000|CC1|   STAYING ACTIVE CAN ACTUALLY  
20110123065020.000|20110123065023.000|CC1|     EASE ARTHRITIS SYMPTOMS.   
20110123065023.000|20110123065025.000|CC1|    BUT IF YOU HAVE ARTHRITIS,  
20110123065025.000|20110123065025.000|CC1|          STAYING ACTIVE        
20110123065025.000|20110123065027.000|CC1|        CAN BE DIFFICULT.       
20110123065027.000|20110123065027.000|CC1|      PRESCRIPTION CELEBREX     
20110123065027.000|20110123065030.000|CC1| CAN HELP RELIEVE ARTHRITIS PAIN
20110123065030.000|20110123065030.000|CC1|           SO YOUR BODY         
20110123065030.000|20110123065032.000|CC1|       CAN STAY IN MOTION.      
20110123065032.000|20110123065032.000|CC1|         BECAUSE JUST ONE       
20110123065032.000|20110123065035.000|CC1|       200MG CELEBREX A DAY     
20110123065035.000|20110123065037.000|CC1|    CAN PROVIDE 24 HOUR RELIEF  
20110123065037.000|20110123065037.000|CC1|   FOR MANY WITH ARTHRITIS PAIN 
20110123065037.000|20110123065039.000|CC1|        AND INFLAMMATION.       
20110123065039.000|20110123065041.000|CC1|    PLUS, IN CLINICAL STUDIES,  
20110123065041.000|20110123065041.000|CC1|  CELEBREX IS PROVEN TO IMPROVE 
20110123065041.000|20110123065044.000|CC1|     DAILY PHYSICAL FUNCTION    
20110123065044.000|20110123065045.000|CC1|       SO MOVING IS EASIER.     
20110123065045.000|20110123065047.000|CC1| AND CELEBREX IS NOT A NARCOTIC.
20110123065047.000|20110123065047.000|CC1|    WHEN IT COMES TO RELIEVING  
20110123065047.000|20110123065049.000|CC1|       YOUR ARTHRITIS PAIN,     
20110123065049.000|20110123065049.000|CC1|       YOU AND YOUR DOCTOR      
20110123065049.000|20110123065051.000|CC1|   NEED TO BALANCE THE BENEFITS 
20110123065051.000|20110123065052.000|CC1|         WITH THE RISKS.        
20110123065052.000|20110123065052.000|CC1|     ALL PRESCRIPTION NSAIDS,   
20110123065052.000|20110123065054.000|CC1|       INCLUDING CELEBREX,      
20110123065054.000|20110123065054.000|CC1|     MAY INCREASE THE CHANCE    
20110123065054.000|20110123065056.000|CC1|    OF HEART ATTACK OR STROKE,  
20110123065056.000|20110123065058.000|CC1|     WHICH CAN LEAD TO DEATH.

20110123065058.000|20110123065100.000|CC1|    IF YOU HAVE HEART DISEASE

20110123065102.000|20110123065102.000|CC1|     OR WHEN NSAIDS ARE TAKEN   
20110123065102.000|20110123065104.000|CC1|        FOR LONG PERIODS.       
20110123065104.000|20110123065106.000|CC1|   NSAIDS, INCLUDING CELEBREX,  
20110123065106.000|20110123065106.000|CC1|  INCREASE THE CHANCE OF SERIOUS
20110123065106.000|20110123065108.000|CC1|    SKIN OR ALLERGIC REACTIONS

20110123065108.000|20110123065110.000|CC1|            PROBLEMS,

20110123065111.000|20110123065111.000|CC1| WHICH CAN OCCUR WITHOUT WARNING
20110123065111.000|20110123065114.000|CC1|       AND MAY CAUSE DEATH.     
20110123065114.000|20110123065114.000|CC1|   PATIENTS ALSO TAKING ASPIRIN 
20110123065114.000|20110123065116.000|CC1|         AND THE ELDERLY

20110123065116.000|20110123065119.000|CC1|   STOMACH BLEEDING AND ULCERS.

20110123065449.000|20110123065453.000|CC1|THE ONLY WAY TAUSHA COULD       
20110123065453.000|20110123065456.000|CC1|ASSURE, ENSURE, MAKE SURE THAT  
20110123065456.000|20110123065459.000|CC1|MITCH NEVER HAD ANY KIND, ANY   
20110123065459.000|20110123065500.000|CC1|KIND OF CUSTODY-- JOINT, SOLE,  
20110123065500.000|20110123065502.000|CC1|WHATEVER-- WAS THAT HE ENDED UP 
20110123065502.000|20110123065504.000|CC1|FOUR OR FIVE FEET UNDERGROUND.  
20110123065504.000|20110123065506.000|CC1|>> IF IT WAS A CUSTODY BATTLE,  
20110123065506.000|20110123065508.000|CC1|THEN MITCH HAS AN ATTORNEY, AND 
20110123065508.000|20110123065510.000|CC1|HE'S FILED PAPERWORK, AND WE'RE 
20110123065510.000|20110123065512.000|CC1|IN A CUSTODY BATTLE.            
20110123065512.000|20110123065514.000|CC1|BUT THERE WASN'T.               
20110123065514.000|20110123065515.000|CC1|I HAD LEXI.                     
20110123065515.000|20110123065518.000|CC1|I HAD LEXI ALL THE TIME.        
20110123065518.000|20110123065519.000|CC1|HE SAW HER SOMETIMES, BUT WE    
20110123065519.000|20110123065520.000|CC1|DIDN'T ARGUE.                   
20110123065520.000|20110123065523.000|CC1|I HAD THE PERFECT SITUATION.    
20110123065523.000|20110123065524.000|CC1|>> THE DEFENSE WANTS TO SCARE   
20110123065524.000|20110123065524.000|CC1|YOU HERE THAT YOU'RE SENDING    
20110123065524.000|20110123065525.000|CC1|AWAY AN INNOCENT WOMAN.         
20110123065525.000|20110123065526.000|CC1|YOU KNOW IN YOUR HEART SHE'S    
20110123065526.000|20110123065527.000|CC1|INVOLVED.                       
20110123065527.000|20110123065530.000|CC1|FIND HER GUILTY.                
20110123065530.000|20110123065531.000|CC1|>> Reporter: JURORS FACED AN    
20110123065531.000|20110123065533.000|CC1|AGONIZING DECISION.             
20110123065533.000|20110123065535.000|CC1|WAS TAUSHA INNOCENT?            
20110123065535.000|20110123065537.000|CC1|OR IF GUILTY, WAS SHE GUILTY OF 
20110123065537.000|20110123065540.000|CC1|FIRST- OR SECOND-DEGREE MURDER? 
20110123065540.000|20110123065541.000|CC1|>> THE REALITY WAS, IF A GUILTY 
20110123065541.000|20110123065543.000|CC1|VERDICT CAME BACK, I CAN NEVER  
20110123065543.000|20110123065547.000|CC1|BE WITH LEXI AGAIN.             
20110123065547.000|20110123065549.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IF JURORS FOUND    
20110123065549.000|20110123065550.000|CC1|TAUSHA GUILTY OF FIRST-DEGREE   
20110123065550.000|20110123065552.000|CC1|MURDER, SHE WOULD RECEIVE A     
20110123065552.000|20110123065553.000|CC1|HARSHER SENTENCE THAN THE       
20110123065553.000|20110123065555.000|CC1|SHOOTER, GREG MORTON.           
20110123065555.000|20110123065558.000|CC1|THAT TROUBLED THE PANEL.        
20110123065558.000|20110123065559.000|CC1|>> WE'RE LIKE, "WELL, GREG DID  
20110123065559.000|20110123065600.000|CC1|THIS, SO, YOU KNOW, TAUSHA      
20110123065600.000|20110123065600.000|CC1|SHOULDN'T GET A HIGHER          
20110123065600.000|20110123065602.000|CC1|SENTENCE."                      
20110123065602.000|20110123065603.000|CC1|>> THAT WAS A REAL BIG          
20110123065603.000|20110123065604.000|CC1|CONTENTION, I THINK, FOR ALL OF 
20110123065604.000|20110123065605.000|CC1|US.                             
20110123065605.000|20110123065606.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT WAS TAUSHA EVEN
20110123065606.000|20110123065608.000|CC1|GUILTY?                         
20110123065608.000|20110123065609.000|CC1|>> WHO DO WE BELIEVE MORE, YOU  
20110123065609.000|20110123065610.000|CC1|KNOW?                           
20110123065610.000|20110123065610.000|CC1|IT'S TAUSHA'S STORY VERSUS      
20110123065610.000|20110123065613.000|CC1|GREG'S STORY.                   
20110123065613.000|20110123065615.000|CC1|>> I WAS ONE THAT HAD A LITTLE  
20110123065615.000|20110123065615.000|CC1|MORE TROUBLE WITH GREG MORTON'S 
20110123065615.000|20110123065619.000|CC1|TESTIMONY.                      
20110123065619.000|20110123065620.000|CC1|>> AND THEN SHE STARTED YELLING 
20110123065620.000|20110123065620.000|CC1|FOR ME TO SHOOT HIM.            
20110123065620.000|20110123065623.000|CC1|>> HE WASN'T THAT CONVINCING.   
20110123065623.000|20110123065624.000|CC1|HE APPEARED TO ME AS THOUGH HE  
20110123065624.000|20110123065627.000|CC1|WAS WELL-COACHED.               
20110123065627.000|20110123065629.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FINALLY, AFTER     
20110123065629.000|20110123065631.000|CC1|EIGHT HOURS, THE JURY RETURNED  
20110123065631.000|20110123065637.000|CC1|TO COURT WITH ITS VERDICT.      
20110123065637.000|20110123065638.000|CC1|>> I SAW THE EMBLEM ON THE WALL,
20110123065638.000|20110123065642.000|CC1|AND I JUST... I WASN'T THERE.   
20110123065642.000|20110123065643.000|CC1|>> AS TO COUNT ONE, WE, THE     
20110123065643.000|20110123065645.000|CC1|JURY, FIND THE DEFENDANT GUILTY 
20110123065645.000|20110123065647.000|CC1|OF MURDER IN THE FIRST DEGREE.  
20110123065647.000|20110123065648.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GUILTY OF FIRST    
20110123065648.000|20110123065650.000|CC1|DEGREE MURDER.                  
20110123065650.000|20110123065652.000|CC1|>> I HEARD THE BEGINNING OF     
20110123065652.000|20110123065658.000|CC1|"GUILTY," AND THEN I WAS DONE.  
20110123065658.000|20110123065659.000|CC1|I DIDN'T SAY ANYTHING.          
20110123065659.000|20110123065703.000|CC1|I LET HIM FINISH TALKING AND I  
20110123065703.000|20110123065705.000|CC1|STOOD UP AND WALKED OUT.        
20110123065705.000|20110123065707.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN THE END,        
20110123065707.000|20110123065710.000|CC1|TAUSHA'S LIES WERE HER DOWNFALL.
20110123065710.000|20110123065711.000|CC1|>> I FOUND IT HARD TO BELIEVE   
20110123065711.000|20110123065714.000|CC1|ANYTHING THAT SHE SAID.         
20110123065714.000|20110123065715.000|CC1|>> TAUSHA'S STORY CHANGED EVERY 
20110123065715.000|20110123065716.000|CC1|TIME WE HEARD IT.               
20110123065716.000|20110123065718.000|CC1|GREG'S STORY NEVER CHANGED.     
20110123065718.000|20110123065719.000|CC1|>> I MORE BELIEVED HIM.         
20110123065719.000|20110123065720.000|CC1|I THOUGHT HE WAS MORE CREDIBLE  
20110123065720.000|20110123065721.000|CC1|THAN SHE WAS.                   
20110123065721.000|20110123065722.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DO YOU BELIEVE GREG
20110123065722.000|20110123065726.000|CC1|WHEN HE SAYS THAT THIS WOMAN    
20110123065726.000|20110123065727.000|CC1|MANIPULATED HIM INTO DOING

20110123065732.000|20110123065733.000|CC1|BUT IT'S NOT JUST GREG, YOU     
20110123065733.000|20110123065734.000|CC1|KNOW.

20110123065738.000|20110123065739.000|CC1|SHE GOT GOING ON?"

20110123065741.000|20110123065744.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FOR TAUSHA'S TWO   
20110123065744.000|20110123065745.000|CC1|EX-BOYFRIENDS, KEITH JONES, WHO

20110123065757.000|20110123065759.000|CC1|MISERABLE.                      
20110123065759.000|20110123065759.000|CC1|>> I WAS ECSTATIC.              
20110123065759.000|20110123065800.000|CC1|I WAS HAPPY.                    
20110123065800.000|20110123065801.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ECSTATIC?          
20110123065801.000|20110123065803.000|CC1|>> YEAH, ABSOLUTELY.            
20110123065803.000|20110123065804.000|CC1|THAT FAMILY IN MISSOURI, THEY   
20110123065804.000|20110123065805.000|CC1|CAN AT LEAST NOW SAY THEY HAVE  
20110123065805.000|20110123065807.000|CC1|CLOSURE.                        
20110123065807.000|20110123065809.000|CC1|>> NO MATTER WHAT THE VERDICT   
20110123065809.000|20110123065809.000|CC1|WAS, IT'S NOT GOING TO BRING MY 
20110123065809.000|20110123065811.000|CC1|BEST FRIEND BACK.               
20110123065811.000|20110123065812.000|CC1|IT'S NOT GOING TO FILL THAT VOID
20110123065812.000|20110123065813.000|CC1|IN MY LIFE.                     
20110123065813.000|20110123065815.000|CC1|>> WE ABSOLUTELY THINK IT WAS   
20110123065815.000|20110123065816.000|CC1|THE RIGHT VERDICT.              
20110123065816.000|20110123065818.000|CC1|>> SHE GOT WHAT SHE DESERVED.   
20110123065818.000|20110123065820.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT'S FINALLY       
20110123065820.000|20110123065821.000|CC1|JUSTICE FOR MITCH KEMP.         
20110123065821.000|20110123065823.000|CC1|BUT FOR THE NOW-EIGHT-YEAR-OLD  
20110123065823.000|20110123065825.000|CC1|CHILD AT THE CENTER OF IT ALL,  
20110123065825.000|20110123065827.000|CC1|MAYBE EVEN THE MOTIVE FOR       
20110123065827.000|20110123065830.000|CC1|MURDER, LEXI KEMP IS NOW WITHOUT
20110123065830.000|20110123065833.000|CC1|HER FATHER AND HER MOTHER.      
20110123065833.000|20110123065836.000|CC1|TAUSHA FIELDS WILL SPEND THE    
20110123065836.000|20110123065842.000|CC1|REST OF HER LIFE IN PRISON.     
20110123065842.000|20110123065843.000|CC1|>> SHE HAS EVERY RIGHT TO BE MAD
